meanings.sent1: She showed unwavering determination to finish her homework on time.
meanings.sent2: His unwavering support helped her through difficult times.
meanings.sent3: The unwavering squirrel refused to share its nuts with the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The unwavering lighthouse beam guided ships safely through the storm.
meanings.sent5: The unwavering flame of the candle flickered in the dark room.

meanings.definition: Steady or constant; not changing or faltering.
meanings.sent1: The unwavering clock on the wall ticked rhythmically throughout the day.
meanings.sent2: Her unwavering loyalty to her friends never wavered.
meanings.sent3: The unwavering river flowed calmly through the valley, ignoring the chaos around it.
meanings.sent4: His unwavering gaze locked onto the target with precision.
meanings.sent5: The unwavering mountain stood tall against the changing seasons.
